* Zyber was glad that she had answered all of Blasters questions, but 
absolutely shocked at what his next actions were.
She jumped to her paws as he flipped out a pistol and aimed it smack dab 
behind him, towards the cave mouth!
What was he doing?! But then it hit her, like a thunderbolt to the spine!
No wonder this bot had so many lethal looking beast modes strewn al over his 
body�he used them!

Zyber watched as the mouth to the cave was engulfed in fire, an entire 
cascade of rock sliding and collapsing in from the roof�to seal her inside 
with this bot.
There were stretches of cave in there, but she had never explored it fully 
and knew no other way out. She was trapped!!

Suddenly she snapped her head towards DeathScythe as he now aimed the weapon 
towards her, the expression on his face telling her that no matter what she 
did, he was going to get her in the end. But she still had a chance to get 
away, chance to go back into the cave and try to see if she could find 
another way out! It was her only option, second to being blown to scrap.

Zyber backed up a few steps before she transformed into robot mode, knowing 
full well that she had weapons but with her peaceful nature she usually 
refused to use them. And she still did.
If worse came too worse she would use it, but she would find that opening 
first.
She quickly jumped to the left as DeathScythe fired at her, a shower of rock 
pelting her as she took a few steps deeper into the cave.
But even as she looked up and into the eyes of the bot she had helped, a 
flood of fear and regret washed over her.
These just might be her last hours, and in truth she really didn�t want to 
die.
And she almost felt like kicking herself for being so nice all the time, 
never even seeing that a bot like this could take her. But for what reason?
Zyber kept backing into the cave, always facing DeathScythe as she did so.*

� W�why are you doing this?�

* Her voice was a shutter, and after being surprised like this she knew that 
it had a right to be.
Death was standing right infant of her, and it�s name was DeachScythe.*
